nodes.title: The Glowing Screen
nodes.story: Their phone buzzes on the coffee table while they're in the shower. You glance over. 'Last night was amazing. Can't wait for round two tonight? -B' Your blood runs cold.

nodes.title: The Search
nodes.story: You check their phone (password hasn't changed). Hundreds of texts with 'B.' Photos. Hotel receipts. Three months of lies. The shower stops running.

choices.text: Leave the phone and walk out

nodes.title: The Confrontation
nodes.story: They come out wrapped in a towel. You hold up their phone. 'Who's B?' Their face pales. 'It's not what it looks like-'

choices.text: Give them a chance to explain

nodes.title: The Excuses
nodes.story: 'It was a mistake! Just once! You've been so distant lately...' They're crying now. 'I'll end it. We can go to counseling. Please.'

choices.text: Agree to try to work it out
Say you need space to think

nodes.title: Attempting Repair
nodes.story: Months of counseling. Constant phone checking. Paranoia. They say they've changed. You try to believe them. The trust is gone, replaced by vigilance.

nodes.title: Starting Over
nodes.story: The breakup is messy. Mutual friends choose sides. You delete all the photos. The bed feels too big. But at least it's honest.
